## Regression Models Course Project

- Weight changes which type of transmission yields the best miles-per-gallon for `data("mtcars")`

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
data("mtcars")
auto <- subset(mtcars, mtcars$am == 0)
manual <- subset(mtcars, mtcars$am == 1)
f1 <- lm(mpg ~ wt, auto)
f2 <- lm(mpg ~ wt, manual)
plot_ly(auto, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg, name = 'auto',
        type = 'scatter', mode = 'markers') %>%
    add_trace(y = f1$fitted.values, mode = "lines") %>%
    add_trace(x = manual$wt, y = manual$mpg, name = 'manual',
              type = 'scatter', mode = 'markers') %>%
    add_trace(data = manual, x = ~wt, y = fitted(f2),
              name = 'manual', mode = "lines")
```
